ErrorIndex.title: Wrapper for index information inside an error.

ErrorResponse.description: Generic error response for REST APIs

code.description: the numeric HTTP error code for the response.

details.description: The optional details of the error response.

dictionary.description:
Dictionary/map of associated data/information relevant to the error.
The error "message" may contain {{name}} escapes that should be substituted
with information from this dictionary.

errors.description:
Collection of errors in cases where more than one exists. This needs to be
flexible so we can support multiple formats

internal.description: Internal error code in cases where we don't have an array of errors

message.description: The basic text error message for the error response.

ref.description: Reference to the error source. Should typically be the URI of the request

type.description:
URI pointing at a document that describes the error and mitigation steps
If there is no document, point to the RFC for the HTTP error code

x-eda-nokia-com.ui-pattern-error: A valid name is made up of one or more components where each component is separated by period characters.  Each component must start and end with a lower case alphanumeric character and the body of the component is made up of zero or more lower case alphanumeric and hyphen characters.

Status.title: Status is a return value for calls that don't return other objects.

com.nokia.eda.appstore.v1.Catalog.description: Catalog is the Schema for the catalogs API

spec.description: CatalogSpec defines the desired state of Catalog

authSecretRef.description: AuthSecretRef defines how to authenticate with the remote catalog
authSecretRef.title: Authentication Secret Reference

description.description: Description (small) about this catalog need to check max length
description.title: Description

remoteType.description: RemoteType type of the remote at the moment we only support git
remoteType.title: Remote Type

remoteURL.description: RemoteURL is the url where we can find the catalog (ex git repo URL)
remoteURL.title: Remote URL

title.description: Title is the UI visible name of this catalog
title.title: Title

spec.title: Specification

status.description: CatalogStatus defines the observed state of Catalog

error.description:
conditions []
Error last encountered for this catalog.
error.title: Error

operational.description: Indicates if the catalog remote is operational.
operational.title: Operational

status.title: Status

com.nokia.eda.appstore.v1.CatalogList.description: CatalogList is a list of catalogs

com.nokia.eda.appstore.v1.Registry.description: Registry is the Schema for the registries API

spec.description: RegistrySpec defines the desired state of Registry

authSecretRef.description: AuthSecretRef defines how to authenticate with the remote registry
authSecretRef.title: Authentication Secret Reference

mirror.description: Mirror is the mirror URL for the registry
mirror.title: Mirror

remoteURL.description: RemoteURL is the url where we can find the registry
remoteURL.title: Remote URL

title.description: Title is the UI visible name of this registry
title.title: Title

spec.title: Specification

status.description: RegistryStatus defines the observed state of Registry

error.description: Error last encountered for this registry.
error.title: Error

reachable.description: Indicates if the registry is reachable.
reachable.title: Reachable

status.title: Status

com.nokia.eda.appstore.v1.RegistryList.description: RegistryList is a list of registries

default.description: Details of an error in response to an API REST request.
Details of an error in response to an API REST request.

get.description: get UI specification for appstore.eda.nokia.com v1

parameters.description: pathname to the UI specification to retrieve
parameters.name: pathname

default.description: Details of an error in response to an API REST request.

delete.description:
Delete all instances of Catalog.  If Catalog is a namespaced resource, all instances in all namespaces will
be deleted, and this is restricted to users with the system-administrator role.
If a non-namespaced Catalog, it deletes all instances of that non-namespaced resource.

parameters.description: a label selector string to filter the set of CRs deleted based on CR labels
parameters.name: label-selector

default.description: Details of an error in response to an API REST request.

parameters.description: a label selector string to filter the results based on CR labels
parameters.name: label-selector

parameters.description: client information for streaming request
parameters.name: eventclient

parameters.description: stream information for streaming request
parameters.name: stream

default.description: Details of an error in response to an API REST request.
Details of an error in response to an API REST request.

200.description: Returns list of deleted resource entries

default.description: Details of an error in response to an API REST request.

get.summary: Get information about the instances of Catalog that have been deleted.

parameters.description: name of the Catalog to delete
parameters.name: name

default.description: Details of an error in response to an API REST request.

get.description:
read the specified non-namespaced Catalog.  If a git hash query parameter
is supplied, the resource as it existed at the time of the git hash
will be returned. Streaming is not supported when a particular revision
is asked for.

parameters.description: name of the Catalog to retrieve
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: a label selector string to filter the results based on CR labels
parameters.name: label-selector

parameters.description: client information for streaming request
parameters.name: eventclient

parameters.description: stream information for streaming request
parameters.name: stream

parameters.description: resource content will be returned as it was at the time of this git hash
parameters.name: hash

default.description: Details of an error in response to an API REST request.
Details of an error in response to an API REST request.

parameters.description: name of the Catalog to retrieve
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: client information for streaming request
parameters.name: eventclient

parameters.description: stream information for streaming request
parameters.name: stream

parameters.description: maximum number of history entries to return
parameters.name: limit

200.description: Returns the change history of the specified resource

default.description: Details of an error in response to an API REST request.

get.summary: Get revision history for the specified non-namespaced Catalog.
